description: Only run rows where the wetland validation creates a valid 4 letter code. Wetland translations are split into LYR and NFL translations. Only LYR translations will run when the row being translated is for the LYR table in the attribute_dependencies. Same for NFL.

translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the second character.
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the third character.
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the fourth character.

validation_rules: hasCountOfNotNull(v1sp1, v2sp1, v3sp1, v4sp1, v5sp1, v6sp1, v7sp1, v1pcm, v2pcm, v3pcm, v4pcm, v5pcm, v6pcm, v7pcm, shrln, 1, FALSE)
translation_rules: pc02_countOfNotNull(v1sp1, v2sp1, v3sp1, v4sp1, v5sp1, v6sp1, v7sp1, v1pcm, v2pcm, v3pcm, v4pcm, v5pcm, v6pcm, v7pcm, shrln, 'translation', 'species_code_mapping', 'pc02_species_codes', layer)
description: Calculate number of layer according to vegetation composition.  Because of its horizontal structure, the present schema doesn't allow to consider verticality in PC01. Thus understory species are not considered in the count of layer.
